town.name: Stonebridge
town.description: A small, self-sufficient farming town with modest trade. Most buildings are made of wood or stone.

farms.description: Numerous farms surrounding the town, providing most of the town's food supply.

storage_buildings.description: Several storage buildings for grain, tools, and trade goods.

landmarks.name: Stonebridge Market Square
landmarks.description: The central hub of the town where merchants set up stalls and townsfolk gather for trade and socializing.

landmarks.name: The Old Well
landmarks.description: An ancient well at the center of town, said to have been there since before the town was founded. It's a popular gathering spot.

landmarks.name: Stonebridge Chapel
landmarks.description: A small, quaint chapel where townsfolk come to worship and celebrate important events.

landmarks.name: Mayor's House
landmarks.description: The residence of the town's mayor, a modest but well-kept house near the market square.

landmarks.name: Blackwood Forest
landmarks.description: A dense forest on the outskirts of town, rumored to be home to various wildlife and possibly some hidden secrets.

landmarks.name: Old Mill
landmarks.description: An old, but functional mill by the river, used by the townsfolk to grind grain.

landmarks.name: River Crossing
landmarks.description: A small bridge over the river that connects Stonebridge to neighboring towns and trade routes.

landmarks.name: Abandoned House
landmarks.description: A decrepit house on the edge of town, said to be haunted. It has been empty for years.

points_of_interest.name: Farmer's Cooperative
points_of_interest.description: A communal building where farmers gather to discuss crop yields, share resources, and plan for planting seasons.

points_of_interest.name: Trading Post
points_of_interest.description: A small post where occasional traders from other towns come to exchange goods. Run by the town's only full-time merchant.

points_of_interest.name: Healer's Hut
points_of_interest.description: A small hut where the town's healer lives and provides medical aid to those in need. Known for herbal remedies.

points_of_interest.name: Stonebridge Schoolhouse
points_of_interest.description: A one-room schoolhouse where the town's children are taught basic reading, writing, and arithmetic.

points_of_interest.name: Bakery
points_of_interest.description: A cozy bakery known for its delicious bread and pastries, a favorite morning stop for many townsfolk.

points_of_interest.name: The Gilded Boar Tavern
points_of_interest.description: The town's only tavern, a lively place where locals gather to drink, eat, and share stories.

characters.name: Mayor Eliza Hart
characters.description: The current mayor of Stonebridge, known for her fair leadership and dedication to the town's well-being.

characters.name: Gareth the Blacksmith
characters.description: A skilled blacksmith who runs the town's forge, creating tools, horseshoes, and the occasional weapon.

characters.name: Mira the Healer
characters.description: A knowledgeable healer and herbalist, respected for her ability to treat a wide range of ailments.

characters.name: Old Man Hobb
characters.description: A reclusive former adventurer with many stories, often found near the Old Well or the tavern.

characters.name: Lena the Baker
characters.description: Owner of the town's bakery, famous for her delicious bread and pastries.
